actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the exemption from income tax for social clubs found to be practicing prohibited discrimination.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny tax-exempt status to any social club which has been found, pursuant to a determination by a court or government agency, to have a pattern or practice of prohibited discrimination.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the exemption from income tax for social clubs found to be practicing prohibited discrimination.
